name: widget-loader
description: This app presets the juno environment on the host and loads other apps

importmap-url.description: URL where the importmap is located

url.description: URL of the app entry file

name.description: name of the app that you want to to load (ignored if url is given)

version.description: version of the app (default is latest, ignored if url is given)

debug.description: if true check the console log for details

importmap-only.description: if true then only the importmap is loaded, all other props except importmap-url and debug are ignored!
